Uses of Class
jeroquest.units.Character

  • Packages that use Character 
    Package Description
    jeroquest.gui
    Provides the classes and interfaces necessary to create a graphical user interface (GUI) for Jeroquest game.
    jeroquest.logic
    Provides the classes and interfaces necessary to represent the main logic of Jeroquest.
    jeroquest.units
    Provides the classes necessary to represent the characters of the game.
    jeroquest.utils
    Provides the classes necessary to represent different auxiliary classes.

      Check if the character given as argument is an enemy of the current one.
